text: By 19. 23 Gr. by the hand of.thy messengers thou hast reproached the Lord, and hast said, I will go up with the multitude of my chariots, to the height of the mountains, to the sides of Libanus, and I have cut down the 19. 23 Gr. bulk or size.height of his cedar, and his choice cypresses; and I have come into the midst of the forest and of Carmel.
